title: Ariadne auf Naxos
brief_description: The Metropolitan Opera production of Richard Strauss’s “Ariadne auf Naxos” stars Jessye Norman tells of Ariadne who saved Prince Theseus of Athens from the perils of the Cretan labyrinth. She becomes his lover and joins him on his travels. Faithless Theseus deserts her on Naxos and she awaits death, inconsolable and heart-broken.
